title: Ashlu Creek - Box Canyon
whats_it_like: The signature run of southwest BC - clean bedrock in a deep box canyon.
scouting_portaging: Difficult - impossible to scout or portage in spots.

time.original: 2-3 hours.  Sub 30 min laps when you know it.

when_to_go: This river is now dammed - has releases in May, August and September.  Possible when the dam spills over at times of high flow.
